Terms of Service
Privacy Policy
SaaS and AI solutions for Business Optimization

Vlue iO is a cutting-edge SaaS ecosystem tailored for businesses across various industries, providing modular and scalable solutions to optimize operations, enhance communication, and streamline workflows. Our services are designed to transform and optimize the way companies operate, adapting to the needs of each sector.
Operations Tracking
Vlue iO Core (VCore) allows real-time tracking of the status of operational tasks, sending automatic updates based on emails and other key sources of information.
Sync ERP with Operational Data
Connected to ERPs such as Odoo, SAP, Oracle, CargoWise, among others, the system updates and organizes information automatically, centralizing the management of documents and essential data.
Cost and Expense Management
VCore helps the registration and control of expenses, such as cash in field operations. Facilitates transparency, monitoring of operating costs and budget management
Process automation

Automate repetitive tasks, eliminating inefficiencies and significantly reducing execution times in administrative and operational processes. It triggers productivity by focusing on what matters and is urgent.
Comprehensive Communication
VCore integrates AI to adapt messages and notifications according to the needs of the customer and the operation, improving communication both within the company and with collaborators and customers.
Meet Vlue iO
Contact Now
OUR PRODUCTS
WHY CHOOSE VLUEDOT
We stand out for our innovative approach and our dedication to excellence in every solution we offer.

Commitment to Quality and Results We work hand in hand with our customers to ensure that our solutions are not only effective, but also generate a clear and measurable return on investment.Continuous and Evolutionary Support We provide continuous support and adapt our solutions as the needs of the client's business evolve.
Contact us
Innovation for Business Optimization
We build intelligent software to empower businesses and transform industries.
OUR VISION
We are transforming the way companies use technology to optimize their processes.

We focus on the creation of customized business software, which integrates artificial intelligence, data analysis and process automation to improve the operational efficiency of our customers, reduce their costs and simplify their management.

This privacy policy describes how VCore and Veep, as part of the Vluedot ecosystem, manage, protect, and respect personal data and information generated by their users. Our commitment is to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the data, in strict compliance with international regulations such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - EU), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA - USA), and the Personal Data Protection Law (Law No. 29733 - Peru).
1. Privacy and Design Principles
Privacy is integrated into the platform's design ("privacy by design").
Information is processed with advanced security technologies that enable encrypted operations without exposing the content.
The use of personally identifiable data is avoided, using internal identifiers that are not traceable.
2. Information Security
All data is protected using robust and configurable encryption systems, with the possibility to increase its complexity based on the sensitivity level or operational risk.
Only the user or the issuing organization has full control over access to the data.
3. Data Retention and Control
By default, user information and conversations are kept for a maximum period of 6 hours.
Users can modify this setting, request immediate deletion or anonymization of their data.
Automatic history cleaning mechanisms are applied to prevent unnecessary data accumulation.
4. Use of Information
Data is not used to train third-party artificial intelligence models or for commercialization purposes.
The platform may suggest options based on usage patterns and user preferences, without third parties directly accessing this information.
Companies integrating services through VCore cannot view or exploit users' personal data.
5. Transparency and Compliance
Users have access to reports, activity logs, and audit mechanisms regarding the use of their data.
Key GDPR principles are followed: purpose limitation, data minimization, accuracy, storage limitation, integrity, confidentiality, and proactive accountability.
VCore offers tools that facilitate compliance with the right to be forgotten, data portability, and the withdrawal of consent.
6. Contact and Privacy Management
If you have any questions or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, you can contact us directly through our official portal or send an email to: privacy@vluedot.com .
Last updated: April 4, 2025.
Last Updated: April 5, 2025

Welcome to Veep, Khala, QuantumEnergy EMS, and VCore (collectively referred to as "the Services"), provided by Vluedot. These Terms of Service outline the rules and regulations for the use of our platform and services, which integrate multiple technologies and third-party services, including Google, OpenAI, DeepSeek, and others.
By accessing or using the Services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Services.
1. Acceptance of Terms

By using our platform, you agree to these Terms of Service, including any updates or modifications we make. We reserve the right to update or change these Terms at any time, and the most current version will be posted on this page. Continued use of the Services after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms.
2. Services and Access

Veep, Khala, QuantumEnergy EMS, and VCore, powered by Vluedot, provide integrated solutions for various industries, utilizing advanced AI, data processing, and automation technologies. The Services are currently provided free of charge, though we reserve the right to introduce a subscription model or offer additional services in the future.
3. Use of the Services

You agree to use the Services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with the guidelines and regulations provided by us. You may not use the Services in any manner that violates any applicable local, national, or international law, or in any way that might damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Services.
4. Data Collection and Use

We may collect data based on user interactions with our AI agents and services to improve the functionality of the platform. The data collected may include preferences, usage patterns, and performance analytics. This information is used strictly for the enhancement of our services and is not shared with third-party entities for their use in training their own AI models.
We do not use your personal data to train AI models from third parties or for commercial purposes outside of providing you with the Services.
5. Third-Party Integrations

Our platform integrates with various third-party services, including but not limited to Google, OpenAI, and DeepSeek. While we strive to work with reputable third parties, we are not responsible for any failures, malfunctions, or breaches of data security that may occur as a result of these third-party services. You agree to hold us harmless from any claims arising out of the use of third-party services.
6. Privacy and Security

We are committed to ensuring the privacy and security of your personal information. We implement advanced encryption technologies to protect your data. We will take reasonable steps to safeguard your personal information, and we allow you to control how your data is accessed and shared.

We reserve the right to store your data, including conversations and usage information, for a period of up to 6 hours by default. However, you have the ability to modify this setting or request the deletion or anonymization of your data at any time. Automatic cleaning mechanisms are in place to prevent unnecessary accumulation of data.
7. Government Requests for Information

While we take your privacy seriously, we may be legally required to disclose your personal information in response to a valid government request, such as a subpoena, court order, or other legal process. We will make reasonable efforts to notify you of such requests when permitted, but we may be restricted from doing so in certain situations.
8. Changes to the Services

We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Services at our discretion. If we introduce a subscription model or change the terms of our service in the future, we will notify users and provide an opportunity to review and agree to the updated terms.
9. User Responsibilities

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately if you become aware of any unauthorized use of your account.
10. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Vluedot and its affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the Services or any third-party services integrated into the platform.
11. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Vluedot, its affiliates, employees, agents, and licensors from any claims, losses, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the Services or your violation of these Terms of Service.
12. Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Services if you violate any provision of these Terms of Service. Upon termination, all provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination shall remain in effect.
13. Dispute Resolution

Any disputes or claims arising out of or relating to these Terms of Service will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the respective country. Arbitration will take place in Lima, Peru, and the language of arbitration will be Spanish.
14. Governing Law
These Terms of Service will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Peru, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
15. Contact Information
If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at privacy@vluedot.com.
Track, plan and achieve your personal goals using secure AI as your chat support.
Get Started for Free
Share your phone number to activate your demo account
Start Chat
You already in!

Automate. Optimize. Connect.

Veep is an intelligent assistant that helps you manage your daily tasks through WhatsApp and other channels. Whether you need to schedule meetings, respond to emails, manage tasks, or receive automatic reports, Veep does it for you—quickly, naturally, and securely.
What can Veep do for You?
Smart Management: Organizes your schedule, sets up meetings, and sends personalized reminders.
Task Automation: Processes emails, responds to messages, and executes actions automatically.
Seamless Integrations: Easily connects with Google Calendar, Odoo, CRM, and more
Natural Interaction: Chat with Veep like a real assistant and receive accurate, context-aware responses.
Reports & Analytics: Get real-time insights into your workflows and efficiency metrics.
Security
At Veep, security is not just a feature—it’s a commitment.

End-to-End Encryption: All interactions are encrypted by default using cutting-edge cryptographic techniques, making them virtually impossible to decode for at least 320 years, even with the most powerful computing resources. Optional encryption upgrades available.
Data Isolation: Every user and business operates within a fully isolated environment, ensuring strict access control and preventing unauthorized data mixing.
Privacy
We also ensure your information remains private:
Privacy Guaranteed: Your data is NOT used to train AI models. The information you share with Veep is solely used to provide personalized assistance and improve your experience.
Regulatory Compliance: We strictly follow data protection laws, ensuring your information is handled responsibly and securely.
Who Is Veep For?
Businesses: Streamline internal communication, optimize workflows, and enhance operational efficiency.
Professionals: Automate tasks and processes so you can focus on what truly matters.
Personal Users: Manage reminders, events, and daily tasks effortlessly.
How It Works
Activate Veep: Connect your WhatsApp with a single click.
Send Your Request: Describe what you need, and Veep will handle the task for you.
Receive Results: Get real-time responses and updates while Veep organizes and automates your daily activities.
Get Started Today
Experience the future of automation—risk-free!
Free Trial: Start using Veep at no cost and see how it transforms your productivity, but if you want you could start by
Supporting us: just buying some coffee!
SaaS and AI solutions for every Business
Vlue iO delivers advanced business solutions that leverage artificial intelligence and SaaS platforms to optimize processes and enhance communication.
VCore, an AI-powered middleware platform

VCore integrates effortlessly with your existing systems, including ERPs and CRMs, to provide scalable, customizable solutions that not only boost efficiency but also drive unprecedented levels of productivity and innovation.
Integrated Artificial Intelligence
Vlue iO incorporates Artificial Intelligence to enhance business solutions, facilitating data analysis, predictions and advanced automation.
Log in to continue...
Integration with ERP

We understand the importance of your systems working in a synchronized way. We offer personalized integration with your ERP to ensure that information flows continuously and reliably. With this integration, companies can centralize their data and automate the entry and updating of information, from orders and stock to financial reports, achieving a comprehensive management of their operations.
